issue.title: Problems stopping all processes associated with ignition

content.raw:
I get the same problem and if I use “top” to view the processes, usually there are several parameter\_bridge not stopped. I’ve been using killall parameter\_bridge to kill them and then all seem to die. Sometimes I also have to kill ign.  

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/3433986725-bridge.png)
content.html: I get the same problem and if I use “top” to view the processes, usually there are several parameter_bridge not stopped. I’ve been using killall parameter_bridge to kill them and then all seem to die. Sometimes I also have to kill ign.
